apps.title: Redaktör
apps.short_description: A text editor designed for use with Termux and external keyboards

content.text: A text editor designed for use with Termux and external keyboards, Redaktör uses Androids 'Storage Access Framework' which allows read/write access to files in device storage, Termux, Google Drive and other services. When using with a physical keyboard standard shortcuts are available (ctrl-o, ctrl-s, ctrl-n for open/save/new).
A floating settings screen includes dark and light themes and font choices
Markdown support includes syntax highlighting and a preview screen
